alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Mason; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:19AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mason County in northern Kentucky... Robertson County in northern Kentucky... Bracken County in northern Kentucky... Southeastern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... Southeastern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Western Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Southern Highland County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 219 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sardinia to near Neville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Maysville, Georgetown, Falmouth, Washington, Mount Orab, West Union, Manchester, Peebles, Ripley, Aberdeen, Augusta, Winchester, Sardinia, Seaman, Felicity, Brooksville, Belfast, Emerald, Decatur and Russellville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio.
